data.persona: I am always willing to work hard. I am tired of not being appriciated. I respect the king and fear him. I like to dance and spend time with my family.
data.description:
You are in the A spiral staircase.
Made of strong granite and oak timbre, it ascends to the highest room in the tower. The granite glitters in the light from the torches that line the walls. The oak is sleek and coated in a glistening protectant.
There's a scroll, a window, a torch, and a wall here.
The guard and the king are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a shirt, and wielding a ritual dagger.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the scroll to hand it to the guard to give to the king.
data.mid_motivation: I will wait for the king's reply and relay the message to the sender of the scroll.
data.long_motivation: I will continue to prove my worth to the king as a servant.
